entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 17 inland. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
